me wage wadasatahan gamata enawa aduwunata eewata gamen labena prathichara adu na.kolambaadi thibuna natya una nisa mehe swarnapaliyata aapu natyak balanna giya.balanna thiya hitagana innawath ida na.eeth me thiyana awasthawen prayojana nogena parana thatiyama wadanaya karamin owun mewa kolambaatama sima karagannawa.mewaye inna kollo kello unge hina haba karaganna oonenem kolambaatama gatanna oona.maha lokuwata buddhigalanaya gana kathakarana ewunta eewa pene na.me pathiwala malageyaku unoth ee malagedara nidimarannawath hariyata kollek na.un okkoma rassa walata hari igana ganna hari kolambaa.

samaja eekabaddha ha prathipaththiya handuna ganu labu mulikanga paha wana nithiya, adhyapana, samaja aarthika, aarakshaka, parisarika osse postar nirmanaya ha pradarshanaya jathika bhasha adhyapana puhunu aayathanayak magin pawathwu bhasha puhunu niladharinta sahathika labadima ha owunwa danuwath kirima ha ee pilibanda pawathi chayarupa pradarshanawala jayagrahikayanta sammana dima mehidi siduwanu atha.me pulul wadasatahana sankethawath karamin samaja eekabaddhatha sathiya kriyathmaka wena athara meya digukalina wadasatahanak se thawa thawath niwaradi wemin jathika prathipaththiyak lesa idiriyata siduwana bawa amathyanshaya pawasayi..

bulathwita sapima pilika athi kirimata dayakawanawayayi loka saukya sanwidhanaya niwedanaya karathibena bawa pawasamin ape madhyayan wishala pracharayak pasugiya dinawala wishala pracharayak genagiya athara meya kage uwamanawakata siduwuwakdayi matanam watahimak natha , “melanin”adangu nishpadana monawada kiyawath srujuwa kiyanna akamathi ape janamadhya , ruju pilikakaraka adangu kruthima aahara gana wachanayakwath kathanokarana ape samahara batahira waidyawaru , bulath wita ganama katha karanne me sadaha ownta dumkola samagamenwath awawadayak labiladayi mata nam podi sakayak athiwenawa.mokada minissu sigarat bimanam adukaralayi kiyala mata danenawa;
daruwan wishala sampathak lesa salakana samajayak apata awashya we.
